price: ከእነዚያም ነፍሶቻቸውን ከሚበድሉት ላይ አትከራከር፡፡ አላህ ከዳተኛ ኃጢአተኛ የኾነን ሰው አይወድምና፡፡
arabic: وَلَا تُجَٰدِلۡ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tujādil ʿani alladhīna yakhtānūna anfusahum inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu man kāna khawwānan athīman
